parameter.name: hostIP
parameter.label: IP Address
parameter.description: Please add the IP Address of your sonnen battery

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: How often in seconds the sonnen battery should schedule a refresh after a channel is linked to an item. Valid input is 0 - 1000

channel-type.label: Battery Charging
channel-type.description: Indicates if the Battery is charging at that moment

channel-type.label: Battery Discharging
channel-type.description: Indicates if the Battery is discharging at that moment

channel-type.label: Battery Feed In
channel-type.description: Indicates the actual current feeding to the Battery in watt. Otherwise 0

channel-type.label: Battery Dispense
channel-type.description: Indicates the actual current dispense from the Battery in watt. Otherwise 0

channel-type.label: Consumption
channel-type.description: Indicates the actual consumption of the consumer in watt

channel-type.label: Grid Feed In
channel-type.description: Indicates the actual feeding to the Grid in watt. Otherwise 0

channel-type.label: Grid Receive
channel-type.description: Indicates the receiving from the the Grid in watt. Otherwise 0

channel-type.label: Solar Production
channel-type.description: Indicates the actual production of the Solar system in watt

channel-type.label: Battery Level
channel-type.description: Indicates the actual Battery Level in % from 0 - 100

channel-type.label: Flow Battery towards Consumption
channel-type.description: Indicates if there is a current flow from Battery towards Consumption.

channel-type.label: Flow Grid towards Consumption
channel-type.description: Indicates if there is a current flow from Grid towards Consumption.

channel-type.label: Flow Production towards Consumption
channel-type.description: Indicates if there is a current flow from Solar Production towards Consumption.

channel-type.label: Flow Grid towards Battery
channel-type.description: Indicates if there is a current flow from Grid towards Battery.

channel-type.label: Flow Production towards Battery
channel-type.description: Indicates if there is a current flow from Production towards Battery.

channel-type.label: Flow Production towards Grid
channel-type.description: Indicates if there is a current flow from Production towards Grid.
